20101229010704.000|20101229010706.000|CC1|WAS WEARING A HELMET OR IF HE

20101229010709.000|20101229010711.000|CC1|SOMEBODY JUST LEARNING.         
20101229010711.000|20101229010712.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE NO INDICATION OF THE 
20101229010712.000|20101229010717.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE OF THE RIDER.

20101229010721.000|20101229010722.000|CC1|>> Reporter: 38 PEOPLE IN THE

20101229010725.000|20101229010725.000|CC1|SNOWBOARDING.
